question: The International conference on “Dara Shikoh - Reclaiming Spiritual Legacy of India” will be held in which city?
explanation: The International conference on “Dara Shikoh - Reclaiming Spiritual Legacy of India”  will be held from April 27, 2017 at ICCR’s Azad Bhavan in New Delhi. The 2-day conference will be organised by the Indian Council Of Cultural Relations (ICCR) and will see the participation of eminent scholars from the US, Iran, Afghanistan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan and India. The purpose of the conference is to highlight Dara Shikoh’s contributions to bring about spiritual homogenisation of Hinduism and Islam and his initiatives in building a cohesive social and cultural edifice in India.
